name: Splitghost - Prelude
description:
In 2030 our planet was devastated by a cosmic disaster called The Catalyst. Nearly 25 years later a technology-fueled society still exists and struggles with it's first economic crisis. The director of MEGACORP has outlawed VR Crypts & placed the entire capital of ERO under a city-wide lockdown. Meanwhile, three ordinary people are linked by a mysterious twist of fate.

The future of ERO is in your hands.
